title: Think twice: they're confusing you
brief_description: Illustrates kinds of faulty or misleading information, such as oversimplification, distortions of fact, and logical fallacies. Designed to encourage critical thinking about the information which permeates public and personal communication. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
